title: Using Checker Plus for Gmail extension
content:
Does anyone know why I might be having trouble logging into Checker Plus for Gmail? I have the extension installed, but I can't seem to log in to any of my Gmail accounts and get logged out immediately.

I've read that it could be something to do with Containers, but I think I've turned Containers off? (Maybe I'm wrong about that.)

I'd appreciate any guidance with this!! Thanks

title: On PCs, what are the MTB and UTB modes?
content:
After the latest Samsung update last week to my cell phone, my PC cannot see files on my cell phone, so I am unable to download photographs from my cell phone to my PC. A worker at the Bell MTS office here in Brandon, Manitoba suggested checking the MTB or UTB modes on my PC. Before that update, I was able to access files on the phone from my PC. Now, my PC acts like there are no files on my phone, which is not the case.

I use Windows 7 and Office 2003, since I prefer them to later versions and find them much easier to use.

How do I get my PC to see these files so I can access them and download my photos?
creator: elijah.18

title: My browser plays a notification sound repeatedly.
content: My browser plays a notification sound repeatedly. Possibly every time a window opens. It sounds so many times its annoying. The sound is the same as when I plug a device into my computer. Such as a mouse. But it happens as I open or close a window. And sometimes when it seems there's nothing visible happening. The sound occurs three or four times in a row sometimes.
